con:soapui-project.name: INSPIRE Download Service Atom TG 3_1
con:soapui-project.con:description: This test project checks an implementation of Atom feeds to the requirements that the INSPIRE Download Service Technical Guidance (TG version 3.1) lays down. It tests for mandatory and optional parts.

con:property.con:name: M-01__Description
con:property.con:value: Test the ATOM Service feed on INSPIRE TG requirements

con:property.con:name: M-01##req7-FeedSelfLink__Description
con:property.con:value: The feed link to self exists and has a proper language reference

con:property.con:name: M-01##req8__Description
con:property.con:value: Feed link to OpenSearch Description Document exists

con:property.con:name: M-01##req9__Name
con:property.con:value: Feed id same as self URL

con:property.con:name: M-01##req9__Description
con:property.con:value: The service feed id is the same as the self URL

con:property.con:name: M-01##req12__Name
con:property.con:value: Feed contains author name and email address

con:property.con:name: M-01##req12__Description
con:property.con:value: Feed contains author name and email address

con:property.con:name: M-01##req13a__Name
con:property.con:value: Each entry has an element INSPIRE identifier code

con:property.con:name: M-01##req13a__Description
con:property.con:value: Each entry has an element INSPIRE identifier code

con:property.con:name: M-01##req13b__Name
con:property.con:value: Each entry has an element INSPIRE identifier namespace

con:property.con:name: M-01##req13b__Description
con:property.con:value: Each entry has an element INSPIRE identifier namespace

con:property.con:name: M-01##req14__Name
con:property.con:value: Each entry has a valid Dataset metadata link, referring to a file of type 'application/xml'

con:property.con:name: M-01##req14__Description
con:property.con:value: Each entry has a valid Dataset metadata link, referring to a file of type 'application/xml'

con:property.con:name: M-01##req15__Name
con:property.con:value: Each entry has exactly one Dataset Feed link

con:property.con:name: M-01##req15__Description
con:property.con:value: Each entry has exactly one Dataset Feed link

con:property.con:name: M-01##req16b__Name
con:property.con:value: Each entry's id is a URI

con:property.con:name: M-01##req16b__Description
con:property.con:value: Each entry's id is a URI

con:property.con:name: M-01##req18__Name
con:property.con:value: Each entry has an element updated

con:property.con:name: M-01##req18__Description
con:property.con:value: Each entry has an element updated

con:property.con:name: M-01##req19__Name
con:property.con:value: Each entry has an element category, including a term and label, to refer to CRSs.

con:property.con:name: M-01##req19__Description
con:property.con:value: Each entry has an element category, including a term and label, to refer to CRSs.

con:property.con:name: M-04##req21__Name
con:property.con:value: Feed id refers to self URL

con:property.con:name: M-04##req21__Description
con:property.con:value: Feed id refers to self URL

con:property.con:name: M-04##req23__Name
con:property.con:value: Feed updated element exists and contains a date and time

con:property.con:name: M-04##req23__Description
con:property.con:value: Feed updated element exists and contains a date and time

con:property.con:name: M-04##req24__Name
con:property.con:value: Feed contains an author name and email address

con:property.con:name: M-04##req24__Description
con:property.con:value: Feed contains an author name and email address

con:property.con:name: M-04##req25-28-31__Name
con:property.con:value: Feed contains at least one entry for data, with a link to the dataset and length set or a section link in case of multiple files.

con:property.con:name: M-04##req25-28-31__Description
con:property.con:value: Feed contains at least one entry for data, with a link to the dataset and length set or a section link in case of multiple files.

con:property.con:name: M-04##req26a__Name
con:property.con:value: Dataset feeds contain seperate entries for each format/CRS combination.

con:property.con:name: M-04##req26a__Description
con:property.con:value: Dataset feeds contain seperate entries for each format/CRS combination. Each entry link for download has one / the same (media)type

con:property.con:name: M-04##req26b__Name
con:property.con:value: Dataset feeds contain seperate entries for each format/CRS combination. Each entry has the same CRS category elements

con:property.con:name: M-04##req26b__Description
con:property.con:value: Dataset feeds contain seperate entries for each format/CRS combination. Each entry has the same CRS category elements

con:property.con:name: M-04##req27__Name
con:property.con:value: Feed contains at least one link to Spatial Object descriptions

con:property.con:name: M-04##req27__Description
con:property.con:value: Feed contains at least one link to Spatial Object descriptions (in text/html)

con:property.con:name: M-04##req31__Name
con:property.con:value: If a section link is provided (for multiple files) then there should be more than 1 section link

con:property.con:name: M-04##req31__Description
con:property.con:value: If a section link is provided (for multiple files) then there should be more than 1 section link

con:property.con:name: M-04##req32__Name
con:property.con:value: If multiple files are provided, then the links shall be of rel='section' and there shall be a content element or alternate link as a description

con:property.con:name: M-04##req32__Description
con:property.con:value: If multiple files are provided, then the links shall be of rel='section' and there shall be a content element or alternate link as a description

con:property.con:name: M-04##req34__Name
con:property.con:value: Only media types listed in the INSPIRE media-types register shall be used.

con:property.con:name: M-04##req34__Description
con:property.con:value: Only media types listed in the INSPIRE media-types register at http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/media-types/ shall be used.

con:property.con:name: M-04##req35__Name
con:property.con:value: Each entry shall have an element category for the CRS

con:property.con:name: M-04##req35__Description
con:property.con:value: Each entry shall have an element category for the CRS

con:property.con:name: M-04##AtomLinkSelf__Name
con:property.con:value: Feed link to self exists and has proper language references

con:property.con:name: M-04##AtomLinkSelf__Description
con:property.con:value: Feed link to self exists and has proper language references

con:property.con:name: M-05##req39__Name
con:property.con:value: OpenSearchDescription contains URL reference to itself(XQuery)

con:property.con:name: M-05##req39__Description
con:property.con:value: OpenSearchDescription contains URL reference to itself(XQuery)

con:property.con:name: M-05##req40__Name
con:property.con:value: OpenSearchDescription contains a template URL for generic search queries

con:property.con:name: M-05##req40__Description
con:property.con:value: OpenSearchDescription contains a template URL for generic search queries

con:property.con:name: M-05##req41__Name
con:property.con:value: OpenSearchDescription contains a Url element that describes a template URL for the Describe Spatial Data Set operation

con:property.con:name: M-05##req41__Description
con:property.con:value: OpenSearchDescription contains a Url element that describes a template URL for the Describe Spatial Data Set operation

con:property.con:name: M-05##req42__Name
con:property.con:value: OpenSearchDescription contains a Url element that describes a template URL for the Get Spatial Data Set operation

con:property.con:name: M-05##req42__Description
con:property.con:value: OpenSearchDescription contains a Url element that describes a template URL for the Get Spatial Data Set operation

con:property.con:name: M-05##req43__Name
con:property.con:value: the OpenSearchDescription contains 'Query' examples with 'spatial_dataset_identifier_code' and 'spatial_dataset_identifier_namespace' attributes

con:property.con:name: M-05##req43__Description
con:property.con:value: the OpenSearchDescription contains 'Query' examples with 'spatial_dataset_identifier_code' and 'spatial_dataset_identifier_namespace' attributes

con:property.con:name: M-02##serviceIdentificationDatasetRef__Name
con:property.con:value: Service metadata contains at least one dataset reference (operatesOn)

con:property.con:name: M-02##serviceIdentificationDatasetRef__Description
con:property.con:value: Service metadata contains at least one dataset reference (operatesOn)

con:property.con:name: M-03##MD_Metadata__Reference
con:property.con:value: ISO Metadata Standard ISO19119/19139, INSPIRE Metadata Regulation

con:property.con:name: M-03##identifierInServiceMD__Name
con:property.con:value: The MD_Identifier exists in the ServiceMetadata

con:property.con:name: M-03##identifierInServiceMD__Description
con:property.con:value: The MD_Identifier exists in the ServiceMetadata. This is necessarry for a working infrastructure. The service metadata must provide references to dataset metadata, through these identifiers

con:property.con:name: M-05##OSD_AtomReponse__Name
con:property.con:value: Response is Atom feed with at least one category with a CRS

con:property.con:name: M-05##OSD_AtomReponse__Description
con:property.con:value: Response of a OpenSearch DescribeDataset URL is Atom feed with at least one category with a CRS

con:assertion.name: M-01##req5-FeedTitle: Req 5 Feed Title exists
M-01##req6-ServiceMDLink: Req 6 Feed Service Metadata link exists
M-01##req7-FeedSelfLink: Req 7 Feed link to self exists and has proper language references
M-01##req8: Req 8 Feed link to OpenSearch Description Document exists
M-01##req9: Req 9 Feed id refers to self URL
M-01##req10: Req 10 Feed contains rights information
M-01##req11: Req 11 Feed contains updated information
M-01##req12: Req 12 Feed contains author name and email address
M-01##req13a: Each entry has an element INSPIRE identifier code
M-01##req13b: Each entry has an element INSPIRE identifier element namespace
M-01##req14: Each entry has a valid Dataset metadata link, referring to a file of type 'application/xml'
M-01##req15: Each entry has exactly one Dataset Feed link
M-01##req16a: Each entry has an id
M-01##req16b: Each entry's id is a URI
M-01##req17: Each entry has a title
M-01##req18: Each entry has an element updated
M-01##req19: Each entry has an element category, including a term and label, to refer to CRSs.

openSearchDescriptionUrl

M-02##serviceIdentificationDatasetRef: Service metadata contains at least one dataset reference (operatesOn)

M-03##fileIdentifierDataset: Metadata fileIdentifier exists
M-03##identifierInServiceMD: The MD_Identifier exists in the ServiceMetadata

con:assertion.name: INSPIRE Media Types list available
Service Feed available
M-04##AtomLinkSelf: Feed link to self exists and has proper language references
M-04##req20: Feed title exists
M-04##req21: Feed id refers to self URL
M-04##req22: Feed rights element exists
M-04##req23: Feed updated element exists and contains a date and time
M-04##req24: Feed contains an author name and email address
M-04##req25-28-31: Feed contains at least one entry for data, with a link to the dataset and length set or a section link in case of multiple files.
M-04##req26a: Dataset feeds contain seperate entries for each format/CRS combination. Each entry link for download has one / the same (media)type
M-04##req26b: Dataset feeds contain seperate entries for each format/CRS combination. Each entry has the same CRS category elements
M-04##req27: Feed contains at least one link to Spatial Object descriptions (in text/html)
M-04##req31: If a section link is provided (for multiple files) then there should be more than 1 section link
M-04##req32: If multiple files are provided, then the links shall be of rel='section' and there shall be a content element or alternate link as a description
M-04##req34: Only media types listed in the INSPIRE media-types register at http://inspire.ec.europa.eu/media-types/ shall be used.
M-04##req35: Each entry shall have an element category for the CRS
Response starts within 30 seconds (using HTTP HEAD)
M-05##req39: OpenSearchDescription contains URL reference to itself(XQuery)
M-05##req40: OpenSearchDescription contains a template URL for generic search queries
M-05##req41: OpenSearchDescription contains a "Url" element that describes a template URL for the Describe Spatial Data Set operation
M-05##req42: OpenSearchDescription contains a "Url" element that describes a template URL for the Get Spatial Data Set operation
M-05##req43: the OpenSearchDescription contains 'Query' examples with 'spatial_dataset_identifier_code' and 'spatial_dataset_identifier_namespace' attributes

con:transfers.con:name: describeSpatialDatasetUrl
con:transfers.con:sourcePath:
declare namespace os='http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/';
/os:OpenSearchDescription/os:Url[@rel='describedby' and @type='application/atom+xml' and starts-with(@template,'http') and contains(@template,'spatial_dataset_identifier_code') and contains(@template,'spatial_dataset_identifier_namespace') and contains(@template,'language')]/@template[1]

con:transfers.con:name: getSpatialDatasetUrl
con:transfers.con:sourcePath:
declare namespace os='http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/';
/os:OpenSearchDescription/os:Url[@rel='results' and starts-with(@template,'http') and contains(@template,'crs') and contains(@template,'spatial_dataset_identifier_code') and contains(@template,'spatial_dataset_identifier_namespace') and contains(@template,'language')][1]/@template

con:transfers.con:name: getSpatialDatasetMediaType
con:transfers.con:sourcePath:
declare namespace os='http://a9.com/-/spec/opensearch/1.1/';
/os:OpenSearchDescription/os:Url[@rel='results' and starts-with(@template,'http') and contains(@template,'crs') and contains(@template,'spatial_dataset_identifier_code') and contains(@template,'spatial_dataset_identifier_namespace') and contains(@template,'language')][1]/@type

con:assertion.name: Response starts within 30 seconds
M-05##OSD_AtomReponse: Response is Atom feed with at least one category with a CRS
Response starts within 30 seconds
Valid HTTP Status Codes: 200,206,301,302,303

con:property.con:name: etf.ignore.properties
con:property.con:value: authUser, authPwd, authMethod, serviceFeedXml, dataFeedXml, serviceMetadataUrl, MdIdentifiersList, mdIdentifiersDatasetMetadata, openSearchDescriptionUrl
